ygData.subject: Re: SPOILER: Quest Information Requested
ygData.msgSnippet: Hate to say this but she moves. I found her SW of the sister Island.  http://members.door.net/enigma ... From:	Bruce Harlick
ygData.messageBody:
Hate to say this but she moves. I found her SW of the sister Island.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Bruce Harlick [SMTP:brucehh@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 2:13 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] SPOILER: Quest Information Requested

From: "Bruce Harlick" <brucehh@...>

I have been doing the Potion of Marr quest found in the Temple of Marr in
Freeport. I am on the last sentry, who I find out is shipwrecked somewhere
out in the Ocean of Tears. Does someone have a location for poor Sentry
Xyrin? A good description of how to find her from the Sisterhood Island
docks or a /loc would be greatly appreciated. I have spent FAR too much time
in a rowboat as it is...

----------------
Celinda Light,
Priestess of Erolissi Marr,
Head Student, Yengtao School
Tarew Marr Server
